title: App Development Competency Enhancement: Computer-Based Safety Education—Advanced VR Simulation Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify workplace safety hazards with 90% accuracy using mathematical modeling in VR simulation environments.
Learners explain risk calculation methods for safety scenarios via multimodal materials (text+images+audio) and achieve 85%+ application accuracy.
Learners successfully propose safety improvement strategies based on mathematical analysis in 2 out of 3 team-based simulation evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
